name: READY RESPONDERS
description: Provider of home-based medical care in several markets
sampleDescriptions: Secure support to expand to additional markets to help with COVID-19 response.
Encourage support for expanding deployment of EMTs both in the home and via telemedicine to help combat COVID-19.
Encourage support for on-demand in-home care backed by telemedicine to help combat COVID-19.
Encourage support for on-demand in-home care backed by telemedicine to help combat COVID-19; support efforts to make COVID-19 telehealth waivers permanent.
Encourage support for on-demand in-home care backed by telemedicine to help combat COVID-19; support efforts to make COVID-19 telehealth waivers permanent.
